name: Apo-Artist
description:
Apo-Artist is a versus-fighting game made during a gameJam at E-artsup's school in june 2018

The topic was suggested by many constraint we choose before the gamejam, and we took " Explosion, the game need to represent one or more artist, Versus-Fighting" so we decided to do a versus fighting enter Salvador Dali and Jimi Hendrix.

I was the only programmer in the project, so i made all the features and controllers of the game.

Links of my teammate : 

Artist : 

Pierre Arnaudet : https://pierre-arnaudet.itch.io/

Hugo Loison : https://www.artstation.com/whokinbea

Louis Riveron : https://www.artstation.com/rayn23
